contest-event.event-date:
May 16, 2015 D SEWBBA (Merthyr Tydfil) Contest (First Section)
SEWBBA (Merthyr Tydfil) Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Merthyr Tydfil) Contest sewbba-merthyr-tydfil-contest-first-section
Rhydycar Leisure Centre, Merthyr Tydfil, Merthyr Tydfil County, Wales, UK Best cornet - Markham. Best soprano - Blaenavon. Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £150, 3rd £100. 6 bands competed
Feb. 22, 2015, 2:23 p.m. June 30, 2020, 10:21 a.m.
1 Parc and Dare Band Andrew Jones Music for the Common Man
2 Markham and District Band Gareth Pritchard Diadem of Gold
3 Blaenavon Town Band Jamie Jones Chaucer's Tunes
4 Lewis Merthyr Band Gavin Pritchard
5 Melingriffith 2 Band Robin Hackett Oceans
6 RAF St. Athan Voluntary Band Archie Hutchison Confluence for Brass Band
